 ******************************
**     **Game Notes:**        **
 ****************************** 
 
 In Age of Empires II: HD Edition, fans of the original game and new players 
 alike will fall in love with the classic Age of Empires II experience. Explore
 all the original single player campaigns from both Age of Kings and The Conquerors
 expansion, choose from 18 civilizations spanning over a thousand years of history,
 and head online to challenge other Steam players in your quest for world domination 
 throughout the ages. Originally developed by Ensemble Studios and reimagined in high
 definition by Hidden Path Entertainment, Microsoft Studios is proud to bring Age of 
 Empires II: HD Edition to Steam! 

 ***************************** 
**   **Install Notes:**      **
 ***************************** 
 
 1. Unpack release
 2. Install Update v2.7.954.0 from the /Update dir into your main game dir
 3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack dir to your main game dir
 4. Play!

 ******************************** 
**   **Additional Notes:**      **
 ******************************** 
 
 You don't need to have previous updates installed

 Read changelog.txt for information about updated content 

 Credits:
 SKIDROW for Steam Emu & CEG Emu
